snippet: All 7,000 Starbucks cafes in the United States have started selling Square’s mobile card reader for $10. People new to Square can sign up and get a $10 rebate, effectively getting the reader free.
abstract: All 7,000 Starbucks cafes in the United States have started selling Square’s mobile card reader for $10. People new to Square can sign up and get a $10 rebate, effectively getting the reader free.

headline.main: Now on Sale at Starbucks: Square's Credit Card Reader
